item.title: Assignment 2
item.description: For this writing assignment, you will think about what you mean by the meaning of life. You’ll discuss that in a structured way. Upload your paper through Blackboard upload, under the Assignments button, any day or time before the end of Monday, December 7. After a brief, introductory, summarizing paragraph which you should write last, after you’ve written all the rest, but place first, construct the following paragraphs. Each numbered item represents a paragraph; it doesn’t have to be long.

item.title: Assignment 1
item.description: Your main task is to identify and reconstruct an argument about the meaning of life and then critically evaluate it. Based on how well you think it works for this task, choose one of the following: (1) the Steve Jobs speech, or (2) a different speech or text you’ve found and cleared with me in advance. That will be your “source text.” From your source text, reconstruct a statement of the form “The meaning of life is …” or “The way to live is ….
